file_content.text: You filthy alien scum. You dare invade this fortress and murder my people?
I may be an "alien," but you're definitely the scum.
It figures you're racist.
Your kind shouldn't even be allowed to set foot on Ord Mantell. You're nothing but thieves and killers.
You worthless criminal vermin. How dare you invade my fortress and murder my courageous brothers-in-arms?
Your pal Skavak stole my freighter. I want it back.
Where's my ship?
There's no ship here for you, only death.
I'm known for my daring.
It was easy.
Now you'll just be known as the idiot who came all the way here to die.
They deserved it.
Our fallen will be remembered as heroes. You won't be remembered at all.
You are guilty of crimes against the oppressed people of Ord Mantell. The sentence is death.
Hey, I haven't oppressed anybody. I only just got here.
It's not my fault.
You work for the gangster Viidu who serves this planet's criminal overlords. You oppress the weak by aiding scum like him.
Harsh laws you have here. Don't I even get a trial?
Where's my lawyer?
The evidence of your crimes lies in the hallways behind you. I'll make you pay for every hero's life you've taken today.
It'll be your funeral.
Memorize our faces well, you criminal filth, for we are your righteous executioners.
Do you have any last words, degenerate swine?
These won't be my last words.
No need.
You can still surrender.
I don't negotiate with corrupt dogs. I exterminate them.
You're all dead.
Let justice be served!
I'll give you one chance to leave here alive. I suggest you take it.
